column1: Congratulations @JohnJamesMI. 2020 is shaping up to be a great year for you me and the nation we will be privileged to serve. Keep marching forward. https://t.co/9oWaeraXrK
The economy is booming- Taxes are down unemployment is at historic lows and the stock market continues to set records! https://t.co/xMSyPvw7Lk

Yesterday while Pres Trump and VP Pence were in MI touting Republican successes on lowering taxes encouraging medical innovation supporting our military securing our borders and record low unemployment I was in DC opposing Pelosi’s purely political articles of impeachment.
Via @GOPChairwoman: Democrats seeking Trump impeachment should be careful what they wish for https://t.co/SiuJyyf186
With the 2020 election less than a year away Democrats would like to deny the American people the chance to re-elect the President because they’re afraid he will win again. https://t.co/3QaKe759S5
To the men and women who have served and are serving - a Happy Veterans Day! Thank you for your bravery and service. https://t.co/SaSd3U1zpP
Mark your calendar- In one year we will have the opportunity to re-elect President Trump and replace Nancy Pelosi with a leader who will fight for our values. https://t.co/Xw3qQaUthN

Wages are up and unemployment is down near a 50 year low. If Speaker Pelosi would stop standing in the way of the USMCA deal negotiated by President Trump we could see even stronger growth. https://t.co/M2dc4DU3zk
